title: ******T213 Update**Finally Have all 46 HOFs scanned and ready for offers. See below!!
author: 111gecko

posts.post_title: ******T213 Update**Finally Have all 46 HOFs scanned and ready for offers. See below!!
posts.post_content:
First off....thanks for all the emails on the other groups. Really a great bunch of people on the forum. Glad I put them here before anywhere else. 

I have finally scanned all of the 46 HOFs. The list with pricing is below. Feel free to make offers, request scans.etc. Will be working on the commons over the next couple weeks (about 150 of them) all graded SGC.

Gary:    [url]newventr1@aol.com[/url]
